name: One Day You Will Die
description:
Positive Press for One Day You Will Die:

"wonderfully crafted indie game...very thought-provoking" - Joe Corbett, Random Nerds

"great concept and easy to play with tight controls...unique, addicting, and fun" - Fredie Mejia, Is That a Podcast?

One Day You Will Die is a procedurally generated side-scroller about growing older by avoiding the most common causes of death, based on CDC data.

Concept, design, art, and music by mike harris

I'd love feedback and can be contacted by email or on twitter:

email - harris.in.nola@gmail.com -

twitter - @harris_in_nola -
